# Fig. Exploration 
## Load data (task 1)
```{r, message=FALSE}
# -------------------------------------------------------------
# User def
task_name <- "change_bandits"
num_episodes <- 80
change <- 40
run_codes <- 1:5
num_arms <- 4

exp_names <- c("test1", "test2")
agent_names <- c("ParKid", "ParPar")
file_names <-
  c(
    "par_action",
    "par_policy",
    "alt_action",
    "alt_policy",
    "kid_action",
    "kid_policy",
    "par_score_E",
    "total_R",
    "change_R",
    "total_E",
    "total_G",
    'best',
    'p_opt'
  )

# Init
E_bias <- log(num_arms) * num_arms

# !
results <- NULL
for (i in 1:length(exp_names)) {
  # Load
  exp_name <- exp_names[i]
  agent_name <- agent_names[i]
  tmp <- load_result1(exp_name,  run_codes, file_names,
                     n_max = num_episodes + 1)
  # Add metadata
  tmp$exp <- exp_name
  tmp$agent <- agent_name
  tmp$task <- task_name
  tmp$num_episodes <- num_episodes
  # Join
  results <- bind_rows(results, tmp)
}

# clean
rm(tmp,
   agent_names,
   agent_name,
   E_bias,
   exp_name,
   exp_names,
   file_names,
   i)
```

# Behave
## kids
```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1.6}
results %>% 
  filter(agent=="ParKid") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=global_step, y=kid_action+1)) +
  geom_point(size=1, alpha=1, color="dodgerblue3") +
  facet_grid(run~agent) +
  labs(x="Time", y="Action", title="Kid") +
  theme_pubr(base_size = 8, legend = "none") +
  theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text.y = element_blank()) -> kid1

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=global_step, y=par_action+1)) +
  geom_point(size=1, alpha=1, color="gray27") +
  facet_grid(run~agent) +
  labs(x="Time", y="Action", title="Parent") +
  theme_pubr(base_size = 8, legend = "none") +
  theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text.y = element_blank()) -> par1

kid1 + par1 + plot_layout(ncol = 2, widths = c(1, 2))
```

# Totals
## Box
```{r, fig.width=1.8, fig.height=1.2}
results %>% 
  group_by(agent, exp, run) %>% 
  summarise(total_R=last(total_R),
            change_R=last(change_R),
            total_G=last(total_G)) %>% 
  ungroup() -> tmp

tmp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=agent, y=total_R)) +
  geom_boxplot(width=0.4, outlier.shape = NA, notch = TRUE) +
  geom_jitter(width=0.2, size=0.4, alpha=0.2) +
  theme_classic2() +
  lims(y=c(0, 80)) +
  labs(x="", y="Reward (R)", tag="") -> p1

# E
results %>% 
  group_by(agent, exp, run) %>% 
  summarise(total_E=last(total_E),
            total_G=last(total_G)) %>% 
  ungroup() -> tmp

tmp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=agent, y=total_E)) +
  geom_boxplot(width=0.4, outlier.shape = NA, notch = TRUE) +
  geom_jitter(width=0.2, size=0.4, alpha=0.2) +
  theme_classic2() +
  lims(y=c(4, 8)) +
  labs(x="", y="Info. value (E)", tag="") -> p2


p <- p1 + p2 
name <- paste(img_path, "total_R_E", sep="")
ggsave(paste(name, ".png", sep=""), plot=p, width = 1.6*2, height = 1*2)
print(p)
```
